banner.subTitle: Inquire for a trial
banner.mainTitle: Time to experience the AR innovations

addCouponCode.title: Register coupon
addCouponCode.label: Coupon code
cautionContent: Coupons are registered and used at the payment center when purchasing product plans or additional service plans.
Only one discount coupon can be applied per product/service and the total discount coupon cannot be applied together with single product discount coupons.
Coupons that have expired cannot be registered or used.
Coupons cannot be used for commercial purposes traded and bought.

couponList.title: Coupon list
couponList.desc: Saved coupons in your coupon list can be used when purchasing products or service plans at the payment center.

message.registerFail: Failed to register the coupon please try again later
message.registerNotExist: Coupon code you entered does not exist.
message.registerExpired: Cannot register this coupon since the validity date has expired
message.registerOrUsedAlready: Coupon has already been used or registered
message.registerDayRistrict: You are limited to use the coupon tomorrow due to 5 consecutive wrong attempts.
message.useExpired: Cannot use this coupon since it has expired.

detailModal.title: Coupon information
detailModal.usedDateDesc: * Coupon can be applied when used during the valid date mentioned on the coupon.
detailModal.expireDateDesc: * Coupons cannot be used after expiry date.
detailModal.targetDesc: * Only the applicable coupon information is shown.
detailModal.desc: To use the coupon, go to the payment center, select the product or service voucher you want then apply the coupon then proceed with payment.
